communities.name: Gridcoin
communities.description: Gridcoin is dedicated to exploring the potential of applying new technologies, incentives, processes, and funding models to the scientific ecosystem.

communities.name: Longevist
communities.description: An overlay journal curating the world's most exciting longevity research. Presented in partnership with VitaDAO and DeSci Labs.

communities.name: MoonDAO
communities.description: MoonDAO is an international collective of people united by the mission of decentralizing access to space research and exploration.

communities.name: DeSci Foundation
communities.description: DeSci Foundation is dedicated to exploring the potential of applying new technologies, incentives, processes, and funding models to the scientific ecosystem.
